root.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_b35 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a1" text, "col_a2" text, "col_a3" text, "col_a4" text, "col_a5" date, "col_a6" text, "col_a7" text, "col_a8" text, "col_a9" uuid, PRIMARY KEY(uid));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_b36 (uid uuid NOT NULL, owner uuid NOT NULL, "col_a9" integer, "col_a4" text, "col_a5" text, "col_a1" text, "col_a6" text, "col_a2" text, "col_a3" text, "col_a8" text, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b36_owner_idx ON tab_b36 (owner);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_b37 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_b1" text, "col_b2" text, "col_b4" text, "col_a1" text, "col_b3" text, "col_b5" integer, "col_a2" uuid, "col_a3" uuid, "col_a4" uuid, "col_a5" uuid, "col_a7" uuid, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b37_col_a5_idx ON tab_b37 (col_a5);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_b38 (uid uuid NOT NULL, owner uuid NOT NULL, "col_a1" uuid, "col_a3" boolean, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b38_owner_idx ON tab_b38 (owner);
